title: Nitrogen Cycle Process Releasing Nitrogen Gas

content.question: Which process in the nitrogen cycle releases nitrogen gas into the atmosphere?

choices.label: Leaching of fertilizers from agricultural areas
Assimilation of soil nitrates by plants
Bacteria fixation of nitrogen in soil
Denitrification of soil nitrates by bacteria

content.answer: Denitrification of soil nitrates by bacteria

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
